alexcrichton commented on issue #3180:

Ok I've rebased on main which involved a fair bit of code movement (as expected since this heavily conflicted with https://github.com/bytecodealliance/wasmtime/pull/3178). Morally though everything is the same, though, just in a different place.

This is hopefully one of the last major steps to excising cranelift!
